pillars.title: System Architecture
pillars.description: Designing systems that scale with teams, not just traffic
points: Architecture decisions grounded in correctness, complexity, and long-term trade-offs
Focus on systems that evolve with business needs
Balance theoretical rigor with real-world constraints

pillars.title: Engineering Execution
pillars.description: Turning unclear problem spaces into reliable delivery
points: Reducing tech debt and execution friction in growing codebases
Structured approach to complex problem decomposition

pillars.title: Applied AI (Practical)
pillars.description: AI integrations that solve real problems
points: Focus on reliability and measurable outcomes

pillars.title: Technical Leadership
points: Helping founders make better technical decisions early
Building engineering culture that values clarity and rigor
